FAQ.question: Is guideline value the same as market value?
FAQ.answer: No. Guideline value is the government fixed minimum, whereas market value reflects actual selling price.

FAQ.question: What is guideline value used for?
FAQ.answer: It is used to calculate stamp duty and registration charges during property registration.

FAQ.question: How often is guideline value updated?
FAQ.answer: It is revised periodically by the Karnataka Stamps & Registration Department.
